content: apiarist cowl by claire borchardt notes & abbreviations size & fit 23 circumference x 13 5 tall recommended yarn heavy dk or worsted weight yarn sample shown in dk held together with mohair yardage ~250 yards suggested needles us 6 / 4mm 16 circular needles other notions scissors darning needle stitch markers 1 for bor 11 for repeats gauge 20 sts x 24 rounds = 4 in pattern abbreviations co - cast on pm - place marker k - knit stitch p - purl stitch 1/1 lc - slip next st onto cable needle and hold to front of work purl next st from left hand needle then knit st from cable needle 1/1 rc - slip next st onto cable needle and hold to back of work k next stitch from left hand needle then purl st from cable needle 1/2 lc - slip next st onto cable needle and hold to front of work purl next 2 stitches from left hand needle then knit stitch from cable needle 1/2 rc - slip next 2 stitches onto cable needle and hold to back of work knit next stitch from left hand needle then purl 2 stitches from cable needle © claire borchardt 2026 directions using german twisted cast on method co 120 st ribbing round 1 *k1 p1 repeat * to end of round repeat round 1 for 11 more rounds body set up round knit all rounds 1-3 *p4 k2 p4 repeat from * to end round 4 *p3 1/1rc 1/1lc p3 repeat from * to end round 5 *p1 1/2rc p2 1/2lc p1 repeat from * to end round 6 *1/1rc p6 1/1lc repeat from * to end rounds 7-13 *k1 p8 k1 repeat from * to end round 14 *1/1lc p6 1/1rc repeat from * to end round 15 *p1 1/2lc p2 1/2rc p1 repeat from * to end round 16 *p3 1/1lc 1/1rc p3 repeat from * to end rounds 17-20 *p4 k2 p4 repeat from * to end rounds 21-40 repeat rounds 1-20 rounds 41-50 repeat rounds 1-10 next round knit all ribbing round 1 * k1 p1 repeat from * to end bind off using jenny s super stretchy bind off block as desired and weave in ends this pattern and its contents are property of claire borchardt pattern and the items made from it are for your personal non-commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern in part or whole without written consent © claire borchardt 2026 © claire borchardt 2026
